topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Creating and Deleting Projects

body.p: As an admin user can create and delete networks as needed..

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Projects panel.
In the Projects table, click Create Project.

On the Project Info tab of the Create Project screen:
Enter a unique name for the project.
Enter an identifying description for the project.
Leave Enabled selected to create an active project or clear the option to create a non-active project
On the Project Members tab select the users who can access the project by clicking the + icon for each user.

Optionally, specify operational quotas for the project. Metadata Items - Enter the maximum number of metadata items allowed per instance.
VCPUs Enter the maximum number of instance cores allowed for the project.
Instances Enter the maximum number of instances allowed for the project.
Injected Files Enter the maximum number of injected files allowed for the project.
Injected File Content Bytes Enter the maximum number of content bytes allowed per injected file.
RAM Enter the maximum megabytes of instance RAM allowed for the project.

section.title: Delete a project
section.p: As an admin, you can delete projects. Compute instances associated with a project will not be deleted.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Projects panel.
In the Projects table, for the project you want to delete, click Edit Project then Delete Project.
In the confirmation screen, click Delete Project.
